channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We paid my daughter and son-in-law’s mortgage when it reached $76K. Here’s why we chose that magic figure.
item.description: “My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I all went to the bank.”

item.title: ‘I’m at a crossroads’: I have $35K left on my mortgage at 3% interest. Do I dip into my $700K IRA to pay it off?
item.description: “Over the last year, my two retirement accounts averaged a 15% gain.”

item.title: ‘I have no mortgage’: Is it reckless to cancel my homeowner’s insurance? I can’t justify $4K a year anymore.
‘It’s been a struggle getting payments from her’: I rent a house to our daughter. Do I just gift her the house?
item.description: “She would be responsible for taxes and insurance, which should be manageable.”

item.title: The classic 60/40 strategy makes sense for investors again
item.description: Some expect it could be time to adapt the traditional portfolio once more, now that fixed income is compelling again.

item.title: Earnings playbook: Goldman Sachs and other big banks lead the first batch of the season's reports
item.description: The big banks this week kick off the corporate earnings season, giving investors a first look into how companies fared in the final months of 2025.

item.title: Where stock analysts predict China’s consumers will spend in 2026
item.description: Beneath China's flat consumer prices, trends are emerging in the experiences economy.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for consistent income
item.description: TipRanks discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Permian Resources and International Business Machines.

item.title: ‘He even bragged about his Mercedes-Benz:’ I rejected two egotistical advisers. I managed my life savings and they tripled over 25 years. Did I do OK?
item.description: “We do not take out-of-country or five-star vacations. Instead, we enjoy time with family and friends and hobbies.”

item.title: Activist Elliott shakes up leadership at Lululemon. How the firm can help reinvigorate the athleisure giant
item.description: Elliott has amassed a stake of more than $1 billion in Lululemon, and it has brought along Jane Nielsen as a potential CEO candidate.

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: FIGR Stock Jumps Big on Blockchain Lending Wave
item.description: Discover why Figure Technology Solutions (FIGR) surged 21.67% today amid blockchain advancements like $YLDS and RWA Consortium. Learn trading lessons,...

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
